=======================
 coopr.pysos CHANGELOG
=======================

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0.4
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Updating Coopr package README files to point to the new
  Google Groups mailing lists.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 2.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Initial release of Coopr to create the coopr.pysos package.

- See coopr.dist for previous ChangeLog information related to Coopr.

- Update PyPI categories.

- Setting svn:ignore properties.
